languages.text: "Я вот уже спрашивала, но еще раз... вот эльдары вроде все из одного рода, да? А я смотрю на тебя, тощий, и в ум не возьму — что ж ты и твой брат такие страхолюдские тогда, не такие, как те, с Януса? Не, конечно, на диете из одной боли красавцем не станешь, но..."

"I've asked you before, but I'll ask you again... Aeldari are supposed to be all the one species, aren't they? But I look at you, stick insect, and I don't understand why you and your kin are so creepy looking — nothing like the Aeldari on Janus. I suppose a diet of pain and torment won't do wonders for anybody's looks, but..."
languages.original_text: "Я вот уже спрашивала, но еще раз... вот эльдары вроде все из одного рода, да? А я смотрю на тебя, тощий, и в ум не возьму — что ж ты и твой брат такие страхолюдские тогда, не такие, как те, с Януса? Не, конечно, на диете из одной боли красавцем не станешь, но..."

languages.text: “我之前曾经问过你，但我还想再确认一次……艾达灵族不都是同一个物种吗？可我每次看到你，竹节虫，我都真的很难理解为什么你和你的族人看起来会如此可怕，为什么和加努斯的艾达灵族长得完全不一样。我猜，吸食痛苦与折磨恐怕不会有美容的效果，可这样实在……”
languages.original_text: "I've asked you before, but I'll ask you again... Aeldari are supposed to be all the one species, aren't they? But I look at you, stick insect, and I don't understand why you and your kin are so creepy looking — nothing like the Aeldari on Janus. I suppose a diet of pain and torment won't do wonders for anybody's looks, but..."

traits.locale_text: “我之前曾经问过你，但我还想再确认一次……艾达灵族不都是同一个物种吗？可我每次看到你，竹节虫，我都真的很难理解为什么你和你的族人看起来会如此可怕，为什么和加努斯的艾达灵族长得完全不一样。我猜，吸食痛苦与折磨恐怕不会有美容的效果，可这样实在……”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Je sais que je vous ai déjà posé la question, mais... Les Aeldaris sont censés être tous de la même espèce, non ? Mais quand je vous vois, vous, avec votre allure d'insecte longiligne, je ne comprends pas pourquoi les vôtres sont aussi affreux... Rien à voir avec les Aeldaris qu'on a vus sur Janus ! J'imagine que votre régime basé sur la souffrance et les tourments n'y est pas étranger, mais... »
languages.original_text: "I've asked you before, but I'll ask you again... Aeldari are supposed to be all the one species, aren't they? But I look at you, stick insect, and I don't understand why you and your kin are so creepy looking — nothing like the Aeldari on Janus. I suppose a diet of pain and torment won't do wonders for anybody's looks, but..."

traits.locale_text: « Je sais que je vous ai déjà posé la question, mais... Les Aeldaris sont censés être tous de la même espèce, non ? Mais quand je vous vois, vous, avec votre allure d'insecte longiligne, je ne comprends pas pourquoi les vôtres sont aussi affreux... Rien à voir avec les Aeldaris qu'on a vus sur Janus ! J'imagine que votre régime basé sur la souffrance et les tourments n'y est pas étranger, mais... »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ich habe Euch schon einmal gefragt, doch ich frage erneut ... Aeldari sollen angeblich alle zur selben Spezies gehören, oder? Aber wenn ich mir Euch Stabschrecke ansehe, dann begreife ich nicht, warum Ihr und Eure Verwandten so gruselig ausseht ... nicht wie die Aeldari auf Janus. Eine Ernährung aus Schmerzen und Qualen wirkt wohl keine Wunder für das Aussehen, aber ..."
languages.original_text: "I've asked you before, but I'll ask you again... Aeldari are supposed to be all the one species, aren't they? But I look at you, stick insect, and I don't understand why you and your kin are so creepy looking — nothing like the Aeldari on Janus. I suppose a diet of pain and torment won't do wonders for anybody's looks, but..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe Euch schon einmal gefragt, doch ich frage erneut ... Aeldari sollen angeblich alle zur selben Spezies gehören, oder? Aber wenn ich mir Euch Stabschrecke ansehe, dann begreife ich nicht, warum Ihr und Eure Verwandten so gruselig aussehen ... nicht wie die Aeldari auf Janus. Eine Ernährung aus Schmerzen und Qualen wirkt wohl keine Wunder für das Aussehen, aber ..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「前にも聞いたけど、もう一度聞くわ…アルダリは1つの種族のはずなのよね？でもあなたったらどうよ。ナナフシみたいじゃない。なぜあなたたちがそんなに不気味な顔をしているのか理解できない。ヤヌスのアエルダリとは全然違う。苦痛と苦悩に満ちた日々は、外見に良い影響を与えないのはわかるけど…」
languages.original_text: "I've asked you before, but I'll ask you again... Aeldari are supposed to be all the one species, aren't they? But I look at you, stick insect, and I don't understand why you and your kin are so creepy looking — nothing like the Aeldari on Janus. I suppose a diet of pain and torment won't do wonders for anybody's looks, but..."

traits.locale_text: 「前にも聞いたけど、もう一度聞くわ…アルダリは1つの種族のはずなのよね？でもあなたったらどうよ。ナナフシみたいじゃない。なぜあなたたちがそんなに不気味な顔をしているのか理解できない。Janusのアエルダリとは全然違う。苦痛と苦悩に満ちた日々は、外見に良い影響を与えないのはわかるけど…」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Ya te lo he preguntado antes, pero repito la pregunta... ¿no se supone que los Aeldari sois todos de la misma especie? Porque cuando te miro, bicharraco, no entiendo por qué tenéis un aspecto tan tétrico... No sois nada parecidos a los Aeldari de Janus. Vale, supongo que una dieta de dolor y torturas no le puede sentar bien a nadie, pero...».
languages.original_text: "I've asked you before, but I'll ask you again... Aeldari are supposed to be all the one species, aren't they? But I look at you, stick insect, and I don't understand why you and your kin are so creepy looking — nothing like the Aeldari on Janus. I suppose a diet of pain and torment won't do wonders for anybody's looks, but..."

languages.original_text: "I've asked you before, but I'll ask you again... Aeldari are supposed to be all the one species, aren't they? But I look at you, stick insect, and I don't understand why you and your kin are so creepy looking — nothing like the Aeldari on Janus. I suppose a diet of pain and torment won't do wonders for anybody's looks, but..."

languages.text: "Daha önce de sordum ama yine sorayım, Aeldariler tek bir tür değil mi? Mesela sana bakıyorum çomak böceği gibi bir şeysin, türünüz niye böyle ürkütücü görünüyor anlamıyorum. Janus'taki Aeldari gibi değilsiniz. Gerçi kim kendine bu kadar eziyet etse hâli benzer olur ama..."
languages.original_text: "I've asked you before, but I'll ask you again... Aeldari are supposed to be all the one species, aren't they? But I look at you, stick insect, and I don't understand why you and your kin are so creepy looking — nothing like the Aeldari on Janus. I suppose a diet of pain and torment won't do wonders for anybody's looks, but..."

traits.locale_text: "Daha önce de sordum ama yine sorayım, Aeldariler tek bir tür değil mi? Mesela sana bakıyorum çomak böceği gibi bir şeysin, türünüz niye böyle ürkütücü görünüyor anlamıyorum. Janus'taki Aeldari gibi değilsiniz. Gerçi kim kendine bu kadar eziyet etse hâli benzer olur ama..."
